nodes.text: Mighty Chronicles, "the little books with the big punch," are 3½" x 4" hardcover books published by Chronicle Books. They often feature illustrated adaptations of blockbuster films such as Raiders of the Lost Ark, Terminator 2: Judgment Day, The Lost World: Jurassic Park, and The Mask of Zorro. Mighty Chronicles published five out of the six Star Wars movies with the exception of Star Wars: Episode III Revenge of the Sith as the company was discontinued by 2005. The Star Wars Mighty Chronicles feature cover art and hundreds of 2-color illustrations (white and blue with black outlines) by Brandon McKinney.
